data.title: Page 10 of Wedding Venues in Aurora, IL - 1 Venue
data.meta_description: Page 10 of wedding venues in Illinois with Wedding Spot, the only site offering instant price estimates.
data.text:
Less than 15 minutes from Lake Michigan, LaSalle Street Church is a stunning stone building that looks like it came straight out of a fairytale.

Whatever function is next on your calendar, from small business meetings and casual lunches to festive themed parties and lavish receptions–we can help make it an unforgettable affair.

Located in the heart of Chicago’s Puerto Rican community, the National Museum of Puerto Rican Arts & Culture (NMPRAC) provides a beautiful and unique space to host your wedding reception.

Loews Hotel and Resort is just five minutes from the Chicago's O'Hare International Airport. This is a fabulous site to host your wedding celebration.

Located in Chicago’s West Loop neighborhood, Formento’s Chicago is the newest brainchild from the proprietors of The Bristol and Bolina.

Throughout the years, there have been nothing but praises for Illinois' premier wedding facility known as the Mistwood Golf Club.

Celebrate the most romantic day of your life at the DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel in Bloomington, Illinois.

Lincoln Inn Banquets sets the stage for a flawless wedding day. The Gaslite Chapel is the perfect site for a romantic, memorable wedding ceremony.

Offering a wide array of affordable yet impressive venues throughout the town of Kankakee, the Kankakee Park District is a must-see for couples hoping to host their big day on a budget -- without skim

The Chicago Marriott Schaumburg can host your wedding celebration with grace and style. The hotel has a ballroom that will suit your wedding vision.

Located in the historic Hyde Park area of Chicago, the Dusable Museum of African American History not only unites art, history, and culture under one roof, but also offers a beautiful backdrop for wed

Featuring three luxurious ballrooms and 15,000 square feet of versatile event space, the DoubleTree by Hilton Chicago – Alsip is the perfect place to celebrate the most romantic day of your life.

If you are looking to make an everlasting impression on your guests with your reception location, consider holding your next event at historical Memorial Stadium.

Nestled in the heart of downtown Fairbury, the Walton Centre is a stunning venue located in the historic Palace of Trade building. At the Walton Centre, every wedding can be a dream wedding.

Located in the heart of Grundy County in the southwest suburbs of Chicago, Jennifer’s Garden Banquet and Convention Center provides a serene oasis away from the city hustle and bustle.

Be part of a legacy when you hold your wedding at The Silver Fox, a venue housed in the historic Masonic Temple located in downtown Streator.

If you are looking to celebrate your wedding day with the pinnacle of elegance and professionalism, look no further than the Tuscany Special Events Center at Rastrelli’s.

A dream city wedding can be yours at Loews Chicago Hotel.

The Francesca's philosophy of good, simple cooking, served in a casually sophisticated dining atmosphere is one that is proudly carried over to wedding events.

Located on the East side of Gibsons’ elegant Oak Brook location and offering nearly 6,000 square feet of pre-event and event space, the stunning new private dining expansion can host 300 guests for a

Host your nuptials in one of of several unique settings at the historic Parkway Ballroom. The Parkway Ballroom was once the swing and sway palace of Bronzeville.

Celebrate your nuptials with family and friends over generous portions of good food in stylishly simple surroundings and exceptional service at Francesca’s North.

Located in the Fulton River District of Chicago on North Canal Street, the Ovie Bar & Grill presents brides and grooms an urban setting to host a lively wedding and reception.

Celebrate the happiest day of your life at The Black Couch Studio and Gallery.

If you are looking for an exceptional hotel venue that blends traditions of the past with the present by adding a touch of class and a lot of edge then the new Holiday Inn Hotel and Suites East Peoria

Enjoy the open-spaced patio with a scenic view of the lake.

Hendri’s Events offers a gorgeous venue for sophisticated and classy couples. The dim lighting sets the tone for an intimate night. Be prepared to create wonderful memories lasting a lifetime!
